item.description:
Local RPGA GM Matt Wilgo is getting together with interested players for his new 4.0 game happening on Saturdays at the store. He plans to either run a series of Living FR scenarios or a FR campaign. The game would run twice a month and characters are starting at first level though evil need not apply.
Players looking for games or GMs looking for players are also welcome to come and check out what other games we currently have happening at the store. Right now we have have another 3.5 game that has just started on Saturday evenings. Along with two other established 3.5 games that run on Wednesday and Sunday nights. If you'd like more info before coming out please visit the discussion group on our facebook page: http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Northshore December Meetup at Toys N Things
